=================
EEA Google Charts
=================
`EEA Google Charts`_ provides Google Charts framework integration for
`eea.app.visualization`_. See `eea.daviz`_ package for more details.


.. contents::


Installation
============

* Go to admin > Site Setup > Add-ons
* Activate EEA Google Charts


Usage
=====

* Within your working Folder add a TSV/CSV File
* Within Actions menu click on Enable Visualization


Authors
=======

  EEA_ - European Environment Agency (EU)

.. _EEA: https://www.eea.europa.eu/
.. _`EEA Google Charts`: https://eea.github.io/docs/eea.googlecharts
.. _`eea.app.visualization`: https://eea.github.io/docs/eea.app.visualization
.. _`eea.daviz`: https://eea.github.io/docs/eea.daviz
